task.title: Creating a Community Group
task.abstract: Create a new Community Group that can be made available for Community Portal users to explore.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Community Groups tab in the Communities app and click the New button.
Enter a value for the Community Group Name field.
Select the entity type from the Member Entity Type picklist field.
step.info: If the Member Entity Type is set to Contact, the system will create a Community Group member for the related contact when the selected user has the Community Portal User profile.

step.cmd: Select the Community Group Owner using the lookup field. In the adjacent picklist field, assign the Community Group Owner a user profile.
step.info: In order for the Community Group Owner to be included as a Community Group member, assign the Community Portal User profile to the Community Group Owner prior to enabling the Is Published field.

step.cmd: Select the Site using the lookup and enable the Is Published field to display the group in the Community Portal.

Optionally, populate the Group Image URL field with the link containing the image that will display as the group's profile image on the Group Search page and in front of the banner image of the Group Detail page. Populate the Banner field with the link containing the image that will display as the group's background image on the Group Detail page. Enter any text to display on the Group Detail page in the Description field.
step.info: If the entirety of text does not fit onto the Group Detail page, Community Portal users can click the Read More link to display the full text.

step.cmd: Configure group privacy and feature settings. Click the Save button.
step.info: The default Privacy Setting is set to "Public."

taskbody.result: A new Community Group is created and is displayed in the Group Search page for Community Portal Users. To view the newly created Community Group, staff users must append cpbase__group_detail?id="Community Group Id" to the community site URL. Example: https://community.force.com/cpbase__group_detail?id=003j000000IdKS1
